typography.rules: Headings must use tight tracking. ALL CAPS for labels (tracking-widest). Numbers and Data in Mono.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-none rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-input hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground shadow-sm rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-white border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200 rounded-lg

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: bg-muted/50 text-muted-foreground font-medium text-xs uppercase tracking-wider

workflow: 1. Setup Tailwind config with the specified colors and fonts.
2. Create the layout components (Sidebar, Header, MainWrapper).
3. Implement the Dashboard view using the Bento Grid strategy.
4. Build the Project Detail view with the Tabs component.
5. Ensure the Code Editor uses a monospaced font and dark background for contrast.

file_structure_notes.components: Use /app/frontend/src/components/ui/ for shadcn components. CUSTOMIZE them to match the 'flat border' style.

critical_reminders: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use white or flat light grey.
Use 1px borders to define hierarchy, not shadows.
Ensure the embed URL generation is prominent and easy to copy.
Validate domain inputs with instant visual feedback.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) only on sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles (rounded-md, not full pill).
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a data-testid attribute.
